title: Albuquerque Police: 4 opened fire at skate park
content:
ALBUQUERQUE (KRQE) – Police say at least four people opened fire at the Los Altos Skate Park last week.
Jaquise Lewis, 17, was killed in the incident. Six others were injured.
Police say the shooting took place shortly before 10 p.m. Sunday out in front of the skate park’s main entrance on Lomas. Around 30 to 40 people were at the park when it happened. Witnesses say two groups started fighting, then bullets went flying.
The Albuquerque Police Department said they have not confirmed the identities of those who fired shot, but they do know that there were witnesses who recorded video of the shooting.
Police are asking anyone with information or cell phone video to contact police.
